mapper.select: SELECT o.order_no AS orderNo, o.user_no AS userNo, p.pro_no AS proNo, p.pro_name AS productName, i.image_name AS mainImage, o.order_name AS orderName, o.order_address_1 AS orderAddress1, o.order_address_2 AS orderAddress2, o.order_phone AS orderPhone, o.order_comment AS orderComment, o.order_timestamp AS orderTimestamp, o.order_payment AS orderPayment, o.order_status AS orderStatus, o.order_delivnum AS orderDelivnum, o.request_type AS requestType, o.pro_stock AS quantity FROM orders o JOIN product p ON o.pro_no = p.pro_no LEFT JOIN image i ON p.image_id = i.image_id WHERE o.user_no = #{userNo} ORDER BY o.order_timestamp DESC LIMIT #{size} OFFSET #{offset}

SELECT o.order_no AS orderNo, p.pro_no AS productNo, p.pro_name AS productName, i.image_name AS mainImage FROM orders o JOIN product p ON o.pro_no = p.pro_no LEFT JOIN image i ON p.image_id = i.image_id

SELECT p.pro_no AS productNo, p.pro_price AS price, p.shipping, p.pro_name AS productName, i.image_name AS mainImage FROM product p LEFT JOIN image i ON p.image_id = i.image_id WHERE p.pro_no = #{productNo}
